item.title: Ukraine’s Zelensky Names Kyrylo Budanov as New Chief of Staff
item.description: Kyrylo Budanov, who has served as Ukraine’s military intelligence chief, is seen as a potential rival to Mr. Zelensky if elections are held.

item.title: Trump Is the Jan. 6 President
item.description: Tragically, America is still living in a political era that began on Jan. 6, 2021.
